com.mk4droid.IMC_Utils

Class My_Crypt_Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mk4droid.IMC_Utils.My_Crypt_Utils

  • public class My_Crypt_Utils
extends java.lang.Object
    Cryptography utility. Encrypt a string (the Password typed by the user) using algorithm AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding and the Constants.EncKey. If typed password is less than 16 chars then it is padded with ' '. Output is a array of bytes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      My_Crypt_Utils()
      Initialize cipher AES CBC using Constants.EncKey
